text_block_list.text: One day, <chrname> came to the infirmary to have their physical condition checked, and——
Ah, yes, yes! A customer... no, a student!
Injury? Illness? Or mental care? Well, just leave it all to me!
Huh? Well, since I'm in the infirmary... a slightly fantastic health teacher? Something like that?
Ah-ha-ha, as expected, you're not fooled. I guess I'll introduce myself normally.
Ahem! For your information, I am——
The savior who guides (probably) countless Umamusume! The legendary (self-proclaimed) bamboo needle master with miraculous hands!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: The name is 'Sasami Anshinzawa'! Wow, feel at ease~☆

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh... what's this? A comedian? Or a suspicious person...?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Wow, you don't seem at ease~☆

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Well, well, well, well, for now. Now that introductions are done, shall I give you a little poke?

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Huh? A little poke, meaning... you'll stab me!? No way!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Ah-ha-ha! No need to be scared! I'll just hit a secret pressure point with my secret bamboo needle.

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Then, you'll get... amazingly... tremendously... in short, something super incredible will happen!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Ah! Let me tell you, it's not suspicious! I've never failed even once!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...My master has.

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Well, well, this is my first job too, so in a broad sense, I've never failed!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: I have experience training for 10 years under a legendary master, serving tea... no, I mean, training.

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Wow, feel at ease~☆
choice_data_list: (It's suspicious to the point of bursting out...!)

text_block_list.text: There's no way I could go along with such a story. I tried to leave with <chrname>, but——

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: W-wait wait wait, wait I said!!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
You're Matikanetannhauser-chan, right!?
The super positive Umamusume who keeps working hard today, tomorrow, and the day after, never seeing effort as a struggle!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Of course I know! I saw it!!
I'm a fan, after all!!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
I came here to cheer you on!
I came to help, with this!!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
So pleeease~~~!!
Give me a chance, okay~!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
She seems kind of pitiful, but...
Getting stabbed might be a bit...~.

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Please please please!
I'll even let you pick the pressure point location!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: I'll absolutely not fail~!!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Probably.

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Ah—no, like, an absolute that's close to probably? Something like that?
...Well, the details don't matter!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
More importantly, what kind of pressure point should I aim for!?
There's ones for ability up, health up...
Even charm up, you know!!

...It smells terrifyingly dangerous, but
maybe there's a possibility of amazing effects
that can't be ruled out... perhaps.
What should we do...?
choice_data_list: Aim for a pressure point that makes you a strong Umamusume
Aim for a pressure point that lets you win races
Aim for a pressure point that makes you healthy and energetic
Aim for a pressure point that boosts charm
It's too worrisome, so let's not do it

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Hmm hmm,
'A pressure point that makes you a strong Umamusume,' huh!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Then I'll go stabby-stab, okay? You're sure?
...Reeeeeeeeeally, sure?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Okay okay, leave it to me!
Come forth, bamboo needle! Find the pressure point!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Now relax~... Whoa, relax~☆

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Stabby-stab!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Eek!?
Stabby-stab, great success!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Whoa!? Whoooa!?
S-somehow, power's
welling up inside me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Amazing! You're a master~!
Suspicious, but the real deal! I'm moved!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Huh, success? For real!? Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
No way~~~!!
How did I do that~!?!?
Genius~~~~!!

<chrname> was brimming with power,
looking completely transformed!

It seems they've grasped their potential.
I felt them take a big step forward toward their dream...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Huh-huh...?
M-my vision's spinning round and round...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
S-something, a giant tomato juice,
I can see it... Eek, no, don't,
come over here~... I don't wanna drink it~...!

<chrname> was visibly
losing their condition...

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Ah~... Well, that's... you know?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Wow, goodbye~☆

They greatly regretted that they shouldn't have
fallen for such a suspicious invitation...

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Hmm hmm,
'Aiming for the secret pressure point to win races,' huh!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Then I'll poke it in! Okay?
...Reeeeeeeeeally, okay?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Okay okay, leave it to me!
Appear, bamboo needle! Find the secret pressure point!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Now relax~... Wow, anshin~☆

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Poke it in!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Eek!?
Poke it in, great success!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Whoa!? Whoooa!?
S-somehow, power's
welling up inside me!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Amazing! You're a master!
It's suspicious, but it's real! I'm so moved!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Huh, success? Seriously!? Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
No way~~~!!
How did I do that~!?!?
I'm a genius~~~~!!
I felt <chrname>'s skill level increase significantly!

It seems you've grasped a possibility.
I felt you've taken a big step forward toward your dream...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Huh-huh...?
M-my vision is spinning...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: S-something, a giant tomato juice is visible... oh no, don't come this way~... I don't wanna drink it~...!
<chrname> was visibly losing their condition...

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Ah~... well, that's... you know?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Wow, goodbye~☆
I deeply regretted that I shouldn't have fallen for such a suspicious invitation...

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Hmm hmm,
'Aiming for the secret point that makes you energetic and healthy,' huh!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Then I'll poke it in, okay? Is that fine?
...Reeeeeeeeeally, is it fine?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Okay okay, leave it to me!
Appear, bamboo needle! Find the secret point!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Now relax~... Wow, relax~☆

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Poke it in!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Eek!?
Poke it in, big success!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Oh!? Ooooh!?
S-somehow, power is welling up vigorously!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Amazing! You're a master!
It's suspicious, but it's real! I'm so moved!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Huh, success? For real!? Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
No way~~~!!
How did I do that~!?!?
I'm a genius~~~~!!

<chrname>'s whole body was so glossy it looked like it was about to shine!
Healthy energy was bursting forth...!

It seems they've grasped a possibility.
I felt them take a big step forward toward their dream...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Wha-what's this...?
M-my vision is spinning round and round...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
S-something, a huge tomato juice is
visible... oh no, no, don't,
come over here~ee... I don't wanna drink it~...!

<chrname> was visibly
losing their condition...

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Ah~... well, that's... you know?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Wow, goodbye~☆
They greatly regretted that they shouldn't have fallen for such a suspicious invitation...

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Hmm hmm,
'Aim for the charm-boosting pressure point,' huh!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Then I'll poke it in! Okay?
...Are you reeeeeeeeeally sure?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Okay okay, leave it to me!
Appear, bamboo needle! Find the pressure point!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Now relax~... Wow, anshin~☆

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Poke it in!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: Hyoeh!?
Poke-in big success!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
...Oh!? Oooh!?
S-somehow, power is
welling up vigorously!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Amazing! You're a master~!
Suspicious but the real deal! I'm moved!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Huh, success? For real!? Huh!?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
No way~~~!!
How did I do that~!?!?
I'm a genius~~~~!!
<chrname> was overflowing with a charm that made everyone passing by want to turn and look!

It seems you've grasped the possibility.
I felt you took a big step forward toward your dream...!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
Huh? Wha-what's this...?
M-my vision is spinning round and round...

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: S-something, a giant tomato juice is visible... oh no, don't, don't come this way~... I don't wanna drink it~...!
<chrname> was visibly losing their condition...

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Ah~... well, that's... you know?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Wow, goodbye~☆
I deeply regretted that I shouldn't have taken such a suspicious invitation...

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Huh!? C-come on, don't say that~...

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text:
--Hey, you!
You've trespassed into the academy, haven't you!?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Gyah-ha!? Oh no, I've been caught!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Wow, I'm outta here~☆

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Ah!? W-wait a minute!!

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text: ...That was quite a person, wasn't it.

text_block_list.name: Matikanetannhauser
text_block_list.text:
But, my parents and little brother always said all-or-nothing isn't good.
I wonder if this was the right thing...

Who was Anshinzawa...
It seemed pointless to think about it, so I decided to forget today's incident.

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Oops, did I mess up?
Well, it happens, happens all the time, right!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
Okay, tell me one more time.
Which pressure point should I target!?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text:
You're making me wait~!?
No but wait, if I take this much time--

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Hey, you! You've trespassed onto the academy grounds, haven't you!?

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: Gyahaa!? Oh no, we've been spotted!

text_block_list.name: Sasami Anshinzawa
text_block_list.text: ...Whoa, time to scram~☆

text_block_list.name: Tazuna Hayakawa
text_block_list.text: Ah!? W-wait a second!!
...If I kept worrying about it forever, it somehow ended up getting all muddled.
What in the world was that... <chrname> and I exchanged glances, tilting our heads in confusion.
